Entry.JapaneseText: 泉を開くカギは<Cyan>ふたつ<White>か。
Entry.EnglishText: So there are <Cyan>two<White> keys that open the spring...

Entry.JapaneseText: どちらかが抜け駆けしないようにするための 対策かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps it's so that neither group can have an advantage over the other?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……とにかく、落ち着ける 場所で考えてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... Well, let's go somewhere quiet to think things over.
